Title: Imitation of Life
Writer: Eleanore Griffin (screenplay), Allan Scott (screenplay), Fannie Hurst (novel)
Actors: Lana Turner, John Gavin, Sandra Dee, Susan Kohner
Plot: An aspiring actress befriends a black widow, but trouble arises when the latter is rejected by her daughter, who tries to pass for white.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 4 nominations.
